entry.title: SpringMVC前台传参后台接收
entry.content: 关于Springmvc接收前台传过来的参数有以下几种方式 1 ) 在方法里面加入 HttpServletRequest参数(很重要,要不然接收不到前台的参数) 123456@RequestMapping("/login")public String login(HttpServletRequest request, User user){ //判断账号 System.out.println(user.getUsername()); return "info";} 或者是这样子 123456@RequestMapping("/login")public String login(HttpServletRequest request, String username,String password){ //判断账号 System.out.println(uesrname); return "info";} 2) 用Map去接收,记得要有 @RequestParam注解 123456@RequestMapping("/login") public String login(@RequestParam Map<String,String> map){ String text = map.get("username"); String password = map.get("password"); return "info";} 3) 没办法的办法(用request取参数,对post和get都可以用) 123456@RequestMapping("/login") public String login(HttpServletRequest request){ String text = request.getParameter("username"); String password = request.getParameter("password"); return "info";} 最后在附上jsp代码 1234567<form class="form-signin" method="POST" action="login"> <label for="username" class="sr-only">username</label> <input type="text" name="username" class="form-control" placeholder="username" > <label for="inputPassword" class="sr-only">Password</label> <input type="password" name="inputPassword" class="form-control" placeholder="Password"> <button class="btn btn-lg btn-primary btn-block" type="submit">Sign in</button></form> 本文环境为 springboot1.5.2.RELEASE 内置 springweb 4.3.7.RELEASE
